mdx.rawBody:
---
Song: Endrendrum
Film: Kadal meengal
---

---------------------------------------------------------------------
---
Notes: s r2 g3 m1 p d1 n3 S
here, r=r2, g=g3, m=m1, d=d1, n=n3 [unless otherwise specified]
---------------------------------------------------------------------


Endrendrum aanandhame
s g   p    S n  d  p
C E   G   C+ B G#  G

ennangal aayirame
s g  p   S n d p
C E  G  C+ B G# G

vaalibathin rasanai 
p  p p p    p p d
G  G G G    G G G#

kannil thullave 
m  m   m   m p
F  F   F   F G

vandha azhagu
g  p   sg  gp
E  G   CE  EG


Stanza 1:

 manjal nira  pooveduthu
 S  S   S S   S  S S S
C+ C+  C+ C+ C+ C+ C+ C+

mangai udal seer koduthu
n  S   RG   RSn  n n n
B C+  D+E+ D+C+B B B B

konji varum paatteduthu
p  m  g m   p   n n n
G  F  E F   G   B B B

vandha sugame
d  n   S n dp
G# B  C+ B G#G

solla  solla nenjai allum kaaviyam   pirakkum
nR R   R  R  R  R   R R   nR d n     p d  gmr
BD+D+ D+ D+ D+ D+  D+ D+  BD+G# B    G G# EFD

kollai  kollum vannam inba raagam   pirakkum
nR R    R  R   R  R   R R  nR d n   p d  gmr
BD+ D+ D+ D+  D+ D+  D+ D+ BD+ G# B G G# EFD

isai mazhai pozhindhadhu kuyile
rm   m d    d n   n  R   R G GRS
DF   F G#  G# B   B D+  D+ E+ E+D+C+

 azhage varuvaai aruge       pa pa pa pa pa pa
 SS  n  n n d    dd dmd      d  p  m  g  r  s
C+C+ B  B B G#  G#G# G#FG#  G#  G  F  E  D  C

(Endrendrum)


Stanza 2:

thanga chilai nee sirikka
dhagam kondu naan irukka
ondril ondru saerndhirukka
ennam illaiyo

thottu thottu manmadhanin leelai arivom
mottavizhndhu vaasam tharum pookkalai rasippom

anaippadhil kidaippadhu perumai
varuvaai tharuvaai sugame


(Endrendrum)
